Dear User,

Your account has been deleted due to some reasons. Please contact us for more information (contact email: support＠yeemos.com). Thank you.

Dear User,

Your account has been frozen due to some reasons. In order to use your account normally, please contact us for more information (contact email: support＠yeemos.com). Thank you.
Dear User, \n \nYour account has been unfrozen. Thanks for your cooperation. Welcome to continue to use.
There is a newer version available for download in App Store. Please update to continue to use.
There is a newer version available now. Please update to continue to use.
There is a newer version available for download in App Store.
In order to use your camera to take photos, short videos and more, we need to access to your camera. Please allow it from system settings.
In order to access to your contacts to upload your contacts to Yeemos\' servers so that you and others can find friends, and to improve your experience. Please allow it from system settings.

In order to select photos or videos from your Camera Roll, save photos or videos you take to your Camera Roll, send photos in Chat and more, we need to access to your gallery. Please allow it from System settings.
Enable location to use more fun filters and see more Featuring on homepage.
Recording audio for short videos needs to access to your microphone. Please allow it from system settings.
In order to continue we need to read/write the internal/external card for your device. Please allow it from system settings.
In order to continue we need to access to your SMS. Please allow it from system settings.
Yeemos requires access to your camera to take photos, short videos and more.
There is newer version available now.

When your account is private, only people you approve can see your posts on Yeemos. Your existing followers won\'t be affected.
When your follow list is private, other people can\'t see your follower and following list.
